job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>Modis is currently looking for a Data Scientist for a exciting opportunity in Michigan (remote to start)! This will be working in a fast paced enterprise environment, working with large data sets, and doing heavy modeling. The ideal candidate would have of 3+ years of data science <span>experience, have worked with customer insight analytics, and has worked on new model development utilizing Python and R. </span> </p><p><br></p><p><strong>POSITION DESCRIPTION</strong>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Build large-scale machine-learning models/pipelines</li><li>Maintain and enhance operational models through their lifecycle. </li><li>Developing metrics and reports to monitor model accuracy and evaluate performance</li><li><span>Translate complex quantitative analysis into business insights.</span></li><li>Collect data, perform statistical analysis, and present solutions to Product Owners/business customers. </li><li>Works hands on with tools such as Python, R, and SQL.</li><li>Define and create the next generation of data solutions.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>TECHNICAL SKILLS DESIRED</strong></p><ul><li>3 - 5 years of Data Science experience&nbsp;</li><li>Predictive Modelling</li><li>Statistical analysis</li><li>Python</li><li>R</li><li>SQL</li><li>Bachelor’s degree in mathematics, data science, statistics, or computer science</li><li>Experience with GCP is a plus!</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>ADDITIONAL INFORMATION</strong></p><ul><li>Excellent compensation packages including Subsidized Medical Benefits, Paid Time Off and 401k</li><li>No Third-Party inquiries</li><li>This role can be remote to start - but will eventually need to be onsite in Michigan!</li></ul>
